about_the_game:
Armoured VR is a Cooperative Multiplayer tank game set in WW2. Take control of a British Sherman and command your other tanks and infantry to achieve objectives and fight through one of the toughest engagements of the Second World War.


Play the campaign of missions by yourself or with friends. Crew up different positions or separate tanks and fight through missions achieving a variety of different objectives, in large open, non-linear environments. Use strategy and teamwork to outsmart your opponents and secure victory while keeping your losses to a minimum.


Command an infantry platoon to escort you through the dangerous narrow streets and destroyed buildings of the city of Caen while using your engineers to clear alternate paths through minefields and tank obstacles. Enemy AT soldiers and guns hide amongst the rubble or in foliage, while tanks sit lying in wait ready to ambush you and your platoon.


Built from the ground-up for virtual reality, all interactions are physical inside the tank. Feel the impact of anti-tank rounds bouncing off your armour, duck down as enemy snipers try to shoot you as you stand in the commanders hatch, drive the tank with the drive sticks, or train your gun onto the target using the handles. Can be played either seated or standing, and doesn't require a large play area. Despite being built for VR, Armoured VR also supports being played without any headset, so your non-VR owning friends can still join in on the action!

content_descriptors.notes: This game features frequent graphic violence and gore of a non-realistic nature, including depictions of wounds that some users may find disturbing.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 5600X / Intel Core i5-11600K or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: Steam VR/Oculus - Requires motion controllers
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Non-VR Requirements
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 5600X / Intel Core i5-11600K or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 and above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: Steam VR/Oculus - Requires motion controllers
  • Additional Notes: Minimum VR requirements

short_description: Armoured VR is a Cooperative Multiplayer tank game. Crew up one, or a whole platoon of tanks as a Commander, Gunner or Driver; Alone or with friends and fight through combined arms missions, working with infantry to win one of the most important battles of WW2.
